name: Croftmode
description:
CROFTMODE

small demo using only the I key– after game loads, first click game to capture cursor, then:

press I = toggle layer 1 (green)

hold I for ≥1 sec = switch between layer 2 (white) and layer 3 (brown)

hold I = show layer 4 (blue)

if you go full screen, click to capture cursor again
